data.title: Aberdeen, South Dakota Population 2024
data.text:
Aberdeen is a city located in Brown County South Dakota. Aberdeen has a 2024 population of 28,002. Aberdeen is currently declining at a rate of -0.38% annually and its population has decreased by -1.51% since the most recent census, which recorded a population of 28,432 in 2020.

The average household income in Aberdeen is $78,965 with a poverty rate of 12.98% . The median age in Aberdeen is 35.6 years: 35 years for males, and 36.9 years for females.

Aberdeen Demographics

According to the most recent ACS, the racial composition of Aberdeen was:

White : 82.55%

Asian : 4.63%

Two or more races : 4.27%

Native American : 4.12%

Black or African American : 3.19%

Other race : 1.19%

Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander : 0.05%
